inclusion.criterion: Patients with ACLF with presence of hepatic encephalopathy > grade 2 as per WHC
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Pregnant women or those who are suspected to be having acute fatty liver of pregnancy
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Malarial hepatopathy, enteric hepatitis, or ischemic hepatitis.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Gastrointestinal (GI) obstruction, ileus, or gastric retention
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Structural brain lesions (as indicated by computed tomography imaging if available and confirmed by neurological exam)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Other causes of altered mental status (i.e. not meeting the definition of hepatic encephalopathy
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Uncontrolled infection with hemodynamic instability requiring vasopressors.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has HCV Cirrhosis, grade II esophageal varices, and recent admission for UGIB. He also describes new imbalance leading to a fall.
